content.question: As a measure of economic performance, the United States gross domestic product <math alttext="open parenthesis, G D P, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>GDP</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> accounts for which of the following?

choices.label: The use of open-source, free Web browsers
A parentâ€™s care of children in the home
The street sale of illegal substances
The cleanup of an oil spill
The production of vegetables grown in the backyard and consumed by the family

content.answer: The cleanup of an oil spill

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
